content:
During the last day, March 17, Russian troops fired at 115 settlements in 11 regions of Ukraine.

About thisinformsMilitary Media Center.

"In total, 115 settlements and 190 infrastructure facilities were attacked from various types of weapons — mortars, tanks, barrel artillery, MLRS, air defense systems, OTRK, UAVs and tactical aviation," the report says.

As a result of a hostile attack, they are killed and injured among civilians, the number of victims is clarified.

We will remind, last day the aggressor caused almost500 strikes on Zaporizhzhia, there is destruction.

As reported by the Armyinform, the enemy continuesattack the civilian populationKherson region: There is a wounded.
title: During the day, the Russians attacked almost 200 infrastructure objects of Ukraine
description: About it reports Military Media Center. “In general, from different types of weapons - mortars, ...
author: Army Inform
